items.question: Which of the following statements best summarizes Mohs scale of hardness?

choices.text: It is a 10-step relative scale in which each mineral, in succession, is harder than and able to scratch the preceding mineral.

It is a 10-step relative scale in which each mineral, in succession, is harder than and scratched the preceding mineral.
It is a 10-step relative scale in which each mineral, in succession, is softer than and not scratched by the preceding mineral.
